Current Medications Documented

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G8427 Eligible clinician attests to documenting in the medical record they obtained, updated, or reviewed the patient's current medications

name: Current Medications Documented
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
